content: अधिवासनं [वस्-णिच्, or --वास् ल्युट्.] {@--1@} Scenting with perfumes or odorous substances (संस्कारो गंधमाल्याद्यैः <ls>Ak.</ls>). {@--2@} [वस्-णिच्-ल्युट्] Preliminary consecration (प्रतिष्ठा) of an image, its invocation and worship by suitable Mantras &c. before the commencement of a sacrifice; (यज्ञारंभात्प्राक् देवताद्यावाहनपूर्वकः पूजनादिकर्मभेदः); making a divinity assume its abode in an image.
